long_description: Keep your dog bright and visible in the streamlined Ruffwear Track. It's great for camping, hiking or running in low light, as well as outdoor recreation during hunting season. Blaze orange with reflective trim, logos, and three light loops (lights sold separately) keep your dog highly visible. Lightweight, low-profile tension hooks offer a quick and secure connection. The Ruff Wear Track Jacket Dog Safety Vest features a durable, waterproof shell and mesh lining.
short_description: Keep your dog bright and visible in the streamlined Ruffwear Track. It's great for camping, hiking or running in low light, as well as outdoor recreation during hunting season.
